website_summaries.verdict: A surprisingly well-made option considering the low price. Though it may not meet everyone's needs, it's the best deal for those who like its style and functions.
pros: Reliable features and a budget-friendly price
RFID protection, ample space, and tough nylon material
The slim design is easy to conceal under clothing
cons: Doesn't have as many individual pockets as some competitors
Material lacks beathability in warmer temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Might not work so well for very thin people and large phones
customer_reviews.text: If you are a very thin woman, this item might not work for you. I say woman because we tend to wear tighter clothes, and due to my lack of stomach fat this item creates an obvious bulge underneath my clothes. Even on the smallest setting, there's a gap between the pouch and my stomach where I can easily stick my hand in, and the belt slides down my waist quite a bit. For reference, my waist measures 26 inches. I measured myself where the moneybelt naturally slid down to without me tucking it into my pants, where I was 28 inches, so if your waist is smaller than that, chances are the belt won't fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Kelly-Voicu

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of mind for your valuable papers when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for a trip to Europe and used it daily for two weeks. It worked perfectly. I wore it with the contents portion on my lower back so it was easier and less questionable-looking to access documents or cards I had stored there. My only recommendation would be to shorten the zipper pulls as otherwise they can tickle! The belt is adjustable and soft, and I didn't really notice the belt even being on most of the time while walking around the cities.
customer_reviews.author: vix

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory for travel
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase for a trip to Italy; I bought one for me and one for my husband. There are very sophisticated pickpockets in parts of Italy and this made us feel more secure. I used a small travel wallet to put inside the belt; it seemed easier to access that way. You could also put your cards and money directly in the belt. There is room for money, cards and your passport. It is nice to have the 2 separate compartments.The profile is fairly unobtrusive but I usually did not tuck in my shirts. I also bought a neck travel bag but never used it; we used this every day.
customer_reviews.author: TB Shelton

customer_reviews.title: So far very good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had a chance to wear the belt for about an hour and I really like it. It conforms to my waist. It has good pockets and mesh places for credit cards, passports, etc. I like the padded, mesh backing for breathability. I really like the elastic, adjustable waistband band, and the quick attach/release buckle. And the price is great. 5 stars! I'm looking forward to traveling and am considering leaving my wallet home entirely and just using this as my travel wallet
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent it very promptly , 3 days. the cover looks very nice with a nice clip to attach it where ever you decide. My issue is that the little pin that fits through the hole in the FOB to secure the key to the clip came out and I loss the key. The buckle was still attached to my belt loop but with no key. Lucky for me this happened in a grocery store and was turned in quickly. I shutter to think where I would have been or done if that were not the case. No pun intended. It might b e a good idea to look for a different case
customer_reviews.author: Jay Morris

customer_reviews.title: Less comfortable than it looks. Sweaty and makes crinkling noises when you move. Hard to access.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, bulky and oddly loud. I took it on my trip but when I tried to use it, I felt uncomfortable and realized i would have to pull up my shirt and flash people every time i needed to pay for anything. It wasnt comfortable at all. The material made loud crinkling noises and made my skin sweat. The point of this is to hide your cash and cards under your clothes so that you dont get robbed... but I felt less safe while wearing it since my money was harder to access while wearing it, and enough of a "show" that nothing was hidden anymore
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Travel smart
customer_reviews.text: I just received my money belt and I must say I am pleasantly surprised. It's made well. You could actually wash this on a delicate cycle. The 2 zipper pockets in the front give plenty of room and the larger pocket has a netted side compartment. If you flip the money belt over there's a nice surprise, another compartment. I would definitely recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.author: KSully

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keeping Items Hidden and Secure While Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to use this while traveling overseas this past week. It does stay unnoticed under clothes. It's easy to get open and closed, and stays securely fastened around your waist. The only gripe I had was that the material in the pockets is really crinkly and loud, as some others have noted in other reviews. The loud crinkling draws attention when the desire to avoid attention is one of the reasons one buys this item. I did NOT receive any compensation for this actually Unbiased review!
customer_reviews.author: Franzfelder Roots

customer_reviews.title: More convenient than an around-the-neck wallet...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for my last tourist trip to Europe. More convenient than an around-the-neck wallet... It was easy to slide between my shorts and my underwear but still fairly accessible under my untucked shirt. Cutting one of the zipper pulls made it easier to tell the difference between the two pockets. (I rarely give five-star reviews because I want to give even an excellent product time to earn its fifth star.)
customer_reviews.author: R. Alembik

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to use during our trip to Italy. I had a regular neck one for travel at airports, passport and boarding pass, and the belt for money and credit cards. After he found a comfortable place to wear the belt it worked perfectly. Our funds were under his shirt, not visible, but easy to access. The belt was secure on him. The zippers worked flawlessly and the pockets were a great size, it would hold a passport in necessary. Great purchase! He was glad not to have the neck pouch around his neck for the two weeks of travel.
customer_reviews.author: returning student

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get rid of carrying a purse but still needed to be able to carry around a few small things. This is slim enough that I can wear it under a shirt if I want to keep it hidden. It is very comfortable and sturdy. I keep my phone, credit cards, cash, key fob, a pen and my chapstick in it on a daily basis. I recently went out of town for a week and was able to fill it with some other things. It got wet and the contents were damp but not soaking and it dried fairly quickly. When it is time to purchase a replacement, this is the one I will get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went to Africa last summer and needed to bring all ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to Africa last summer and needed to bring all cash after paying safari fee for a two week trip, over $2K cash This money belt served the purpose of keeping my money hidden. Safe, secure, low profile. I was nervous a few times when I had to remove money to get it exchanged, but that was not the fault of the belt. Boyfriend, now fiancé provided cover. I have traveled extensively to developing countries for work, where cash is the currency, and while a money belt is only 1 part of keeping yourself - this did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Simplypeg

customer_reviews.title: Nylon rip stop fabric is noisy and doesn't breathe
customer_reviews.text: I have an old money belt made of fabric and it's better than this new stiff, nylon fabric one. I like the RFID feature but simply want to replace my all fabric, comfy, breathable, ancient belt. I got mine from Grand Circle Travel decades ago and lost it so wanted another. I've since found it and I guess the old adage, "they don't make them like they used to!" applies!! Venture 4th ranked high for money belt quality, but I think I'll return it....not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelli Noelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect money belt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased beige and a black money belts and we used them in our recent trip overseas. They were so perfect and comfortable. Held passports, money, credit cards all comfortably and not bulky. Even fits a lipstick and cell phone without bulk. My husband wore under his shirt and I wore under and over clothing, depending on the outfit, and these held up well. High quality and great value. Thanks also for the RFID sleeves for passports and credit cards-nice surprise. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMP

customer_reviews.title: The best money belt I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This money belt is light weight, comfortable, does not make you sweat, and is discreet. This met all my needs. We were traveling to Rome in the June heat where it is known there are pick pockets. I wore this mostly under my shirt and would forget it was there. It held my passport and dollars in the back compartment. I put tickets and Euros in the main compartment and coins and cards in the smaller compartment to the left. I didn't even use the "hidden compartment" but as in some of the reviews that might also be a good compartment for cash. The value for money for this product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Elastic waist band needs to be reinforced
customer_reviews.text: This belt on its own is amazing. I bought this belt for a recent trip to Mexico, and I had it on me the whole time and you couldn’t even tell that I was wearing it. However, the reason I’m giving it such a low score is because the elastic band was detaching from the pouch after simply wearing it. Other than that I have no complaint. (Updated review) Venture 4th contacted me and provided a full refund and replaced the item and no cost to. The customer service was amazing and like I said before other than that little mishap it is an amazing money belt!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: The two pockets are nice, as are the mesh pockets inside of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for the duration of my trip to Europe. The two pockets are nice, as are the mesh pockets inside of the big pocket. The only two issues are the band being deformed when it was no longer stretched (it looks sort of like bacon), and the fact that it is not waterproof/water resistant. The latter is more of an issue. I had to wrap my passport in a ziplock baggie to to keep it totally dry.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor V

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have when in places, overseas and in crowds where security is a concern. Comfortable to wear. I always have nothing in my pocket worth losing when I am in those situations or I carry a dummy wallet. Easier to use than a money belt.
customer_reviews.author: Delirious

customer_reviews.title: Would look okay worn outside of shirt but better idea is shirt with button shirt over it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very close to the body and can be adjusted for smaller to larger waist size. Would look okay worn outside of shirt but better idea is shirt with button shirt over it for ease of removing at TSA check. Bought for next trip to theme park but sure to use at airport. I like it much better than the long holder that goes around the neck that I already own. Easy to open zippers and easy access. Don't over-stuff it. Phone will fit but that ruins the purpose of a flat, invisible wallet.
customer_reviews.author: FLRL

customer_reviews.title: Pack it in!
customer_reviews.text: Safe way to keep valuables on your person, i.e belted in soft silk zippered pouch that tucks in between your briefs and pants/skirt/dress. The new RFID feature protects credit cards from skimmers too. An economical and easy way to carry funds, passport, credit cards and a key, in a relatively flat format (depending on how you stack it in). Still accessible at check out counters, if you pull the pack to the outside. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. May

customer_reviews.title: Like a second skin
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about this product as it was so much larger than the ones you wear over your neck. That kind was uncomfortable and bulky enough to show thru my shirt so I wanted to try a waistbelt type instead. I put some items inside, strapped it on, and finished getting dressed. Surprised to discover how well it molded to my body. Despite the bright color I bought, it was completely concealed by my white pants and light color shirt. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this style for my husband thinking it wouldn't be comfortable on me (I have a very large abdomen) but after using it a few times I decided it works as well for me as for him. Perfect for holding passports and extra cash. I didn't try it with my cell phone (which is not small) but the zippers are large enough to accommodate it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiland R Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: This money belt rocks! In five weeks of motorcycle travel in Argentina and Chile, this money belt was always on my person, as I was carrying my passport and lots of cash reserves. It even blended in with my gray riding suit. Its flat profile made it inconspicuous even when I was wearing regular pants and T-shirts or blouses. Dislikes: One of the compartments could be a tiny bit higher to accommodate a U.S. passport. My travel document always rode up against the zipper, which isn't good for the longevity of my passport. Still, a great belt that I will always take with me on similar trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She is extremely petite, but it did not occur to me that this absolutely would not go small enough for her waist. Falls right off of her hips. Strange. Seems like it’s made well enough. I’m sure we will end up giving it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Emanderson

customer_reviews.title: Design needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are too close together. When wearing it the mesh liner is difficult to separate from the opposite wall of the pocket. It made it too painfully obvious that I was wearing such a device because it took forever to hunt and separate the different pockets trying to differentiate between the two.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: was comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I used this money belt on a recent trip overseas and it worked out ok. The only thing I'd change is not having the inside pockets made from mesh - I'd make them from a solid fabric panel because I was constantly snagging corners of documents on the mesh because of the necessarily snug fit of the money belt against my body. Other than that, the money belt did its job, was comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie McP

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for two weeks in Europe
customer_reviews.text: I used this money belt for two weeks while traveling in Europe. I didn't visit any places that I thought were notorious for pickpockets, but one can never be too sure about these things these days. Needless to say, it did its job and it did it well. I carried cash, credit cards, and my passport while walking around cities all day, and I quickly forgot that I was wearing it. This is a valuable piece of anyone's travel gear.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Slightly awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked reasonably well, but was awkward to use. I finally wore it outside my pants most of the time. It also said it was approved by TSA, but they STILL required me to take it OFF when I went through security. (Kind of misleading, if you ask me.) It does seem to be made reasonably well, and is very lightweight, but I used my money belt more for concealing my cask than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tuscola50

customer_reviews.title: RFID safe
customer_reviews.text: Wore this every day on a Rome trip. I've worn other money belts without RFID & thought it was time to upgrade. It is sturdy & adjustable & the stretchy belt didn't curl or roll with wear. It didn't get too hot or noticeable even when walking briskly for miles. Good size, strong zippers. I may trim off the zipper pulls since they don't add much & I don't reach in to use - just use it like a safe while paying from my wallet on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for a trip abroad. I had trouble with the zipper mechanism on one of them, but otherwise they worked as advertised. They held the items I wanted, did not roll up, were not bulky, and I felt safe that my valuables were protected on outings and tours. I was contacted by the owner of the company immediately after they found out my difficulty with the zipper mechanism. Without question or return my money was refunded for the one that was not operating properly. Great customer service, cant always expect that every product will be perfect but a company that stands behind its product is invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not RFID
customer_reviews.text: It fits great and I love the slim design especially that it is concealed under my shirt. The only downside is the RFID is not built into the pack, it only comes with flimsy cardboard card holders and one for passport, none of them are RFID. I ended up a buying slim RFID wallet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Money Belt Material Very Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: The first and only time I used this money best for traveling the material was very scratchy on bare skin. I waited too long to return it as I did not have occasion to travel earlier. I cannot recommend this money belt, will not use it again, and intend to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great but must reinforce clasp
customer_reviews.text: Use a large safety pin to pin together at fastening to make sure a pickpocket can't just press clasp and remove. They are very clever and quick. On a bus a Naples gypsy actually reached under my sweater and undid the clasp. I wouldn't have known except I felt her pulling on it when the safety pin held it on.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Read

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: I am 83 yrs old & just took a trip from LAX to London/Bristol. My family teased me when I pulled my passport etc from my money belt but let me tell you, I did not have to concern myself with carrying ANYTHING but my cane & umbrella.... I liked the fact it was flat with 2 compartments so I didn’t have to reveal my passport every time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Bette Maxfield

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am planning on using the belt while in Europe this summer. Rating it would seem best after I use it. It does appear to be well made and empty it is pliable and easy to wear. Hoping with the essentials in it, including my phone and after lots of traveling it will prove to be a great choice. Thus far I am happy with my purchase so I give it 4 stars. I might feel 5 stars after my trip. More later!
customer_reviews.author: RadicallyAged

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and innovative
customer_reviews.text: I am packing for an extended overseas trip, and this belt looks & feels so much more secure than the old neck pouch I have used for decades. There was no RFID back then, so I hope this RFID works. I realized I put it on backwards, but it was so soft & comfortable that I forgot I had it on for over 2 hours...! I'll continue to wear it that way, with the stiffer mesh on the outside & the soft pockets inside against your middle..
customer_reviews.author: D Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a secure back pack for our recent trip to Paris. After researching I decided on this bag, there was ple nty of room for our cannon camera and lens, umbrella and other items. I really liked the anti left clips-- there was one specific time that we believe this bag detered a pickpocket couple. This bag fit what I was looking for--I'm sure we'll find uses for it here at home.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for travel
customer_reviews.text: Thieves prey on tourists, especially in crowded areas. Wearing this wallet under your pants and shirt shields your coveted passport and credit cards. It will save you a lot of heartache from having to report and replace these precious items. It does tend to get in the way when you sit down, but you can pull it up a little and then push it back down when you stand.
customer_reviews.author: DC3

customer_reviews.title: Very good traveling money belt
customer_reviews.text: Very good traveling money belt. I bought this belt for traveling in Europe. It worked well for me to carry additional cash and to store my passport and train tickets, etc. The money belt is a very good purchase for the price. It has been durable, but remember this is an item that is not used continuously- at least I don’t use it too often.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gramajo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Excellent Service!
customer_reviews.text: The belts appear to be everything I was wanting: roomy, passport-sized pockets, adjustable strap, mesh backing for breathability in warm climates, and - most importantly - RFID protection. I purchased them for my son and his bride-to-be who will be making their first overseas trip in November. Of the many worries this adventure causes, several are alleviated by these money belts. Also, this supplier gives his customers personalized, direct communication no robo-mail or automated phone lines. With the very reasonable price, there is no down side.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety and has some room for personal items including cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't like to keep things wrapped around my stomach, I felt very confident with keeping my personal items safe. We traveled to Prague and pickpocketing is very well known in high traffic areas. One of the women in a conference we attended was a victim at the St. George Bridge. I recommend this for a passport, some cash if needed, credit cards and I did put my samsung note 3 phone in but became a little cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: Elastic belt is gentle. I wear size 22 pants and the belt at its longest fits fine. Pouch is light but seems well made. Holds iPhone 6S in an Otterbox. Separate mesh slot inside for passport, another for cash. Wide zipper area across front for tickets or other documents.
customer_reviews.author: LParkis

customer_reviews.title: a great traveling companion
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the perfect companion for your traveling documents and essential needs, THIS IS IT ! inexpensive, discretely thin, great colors and with enough compartments to keep, handy cash, Passport, credit card etcetera, secured and under your shirt practically invisible, i highly recommend tgis product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Carranza

customer_reviews.title: I think it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It's really great to have since it's fairly large but not bulky as long as I didn't stuff it with things. When there is a minimum amount of items in there (like money, extra sd cards, compact camera, 1 passport, etc.), it's almost unnoticeable that its under my shirt (my hip is small and I don't have a belly). I think it's harder for someone to target my stuff since the strap is snuggle and everything is under my shirt - of course it's sort weird that I need to lift my shirt to get some money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protection for some valuables while on travel.
customer_reviews.text: Did not use on my last trips. The products looks good and replaces another one I used during travel. I also purchased a neck wallet from the same company that I did use. It is also a very good product and was very useful during my trips. My old belt and neck wallet were not RFID, so I bought these. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction and well thought out pocket placement
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and well thought out pocket placement, including the rear netting pocket, that was smart. Product feels very solid, not flimsy. With all my cards and passport, this money belt just could not be felt under my clothing, weightless! The ONLY way anyone would have any HOPE of pickpocketing you is to literally pull your pants down, that's now well hidden this product is when used correctly! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: MAHJr

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight roomy secure and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet as I am going on a trip and wanted it for that. However, looked it over and tried the fit. Seems like it is just what I wanted. Light weight, room for cards and money, phone, ETC. Lightweight and durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: ... my trip to Italy and I think it's a good investment. I appreciated that the RFID was in ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this before my trip to Italy and I think it's a good investment. I appreciated that the RFID was in the lining as opposed to a metal case that I'd seen offered in other wallets. As woman with a bit of a tummy I was worried this would make me look bulky but I was surprised at how discrete it was. I felt secure walking around and being on crowded buses. The two zip pockets are good and the mesh pockets in the larger one were great for separating my different currencies and coins. I think this is a good investment if you're traveling to place where pickpocketing is a real concern.
customer_reviews.author: Sonibug13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Invisible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Product for use on my honeymoon outside of the country. It worked great. It was lightweight, invisible, durable , and held everything that I needed. It’s not like a normal fanny pack. No one could tell that I had it on, and I forgot that I had it on sometimes. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeffg268

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe way to carry cash!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to transport a bit of cash I was using to buy a car. I flew to pick it up and wore the belt throughout the TSA check, wait at the gates, (twice) and the flights. Almost forgot I was wearing it, it was so comfortable. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Hank Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my important items.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this money belt. It lays flat under my clothes yet can hold my iphone 6plus without a problem. My only concern is the elastic strap that goes around my waist is so stretchable, I'm afraid it will soon become too stretched out to wear. So far so good, hoping it stays tight enough to stay up on my waist.
customer_reviews.author: SHWilson

customer_reviews.title: Pack a limited number of items for stealth
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for. Not too obtrusive and would make it hard for thieves and pick pockets to even know it’s there. Zippers seem like good quality ones and materials seem good. If you only put in cash ID and maybe your passport along with maybe a phone, it seems quite workable. If you plan to pack more, it will bloat it and will give up its stealthy nature.
customer_reviews.author: CheapSeats

customer_reviews.title: Lays flat. Stays hidden. RFID
customer_reviews.text: I wear this belt discreetly under a t shirt when I’m helping coach our Special Olympic athletes. It holds my phone, keys, license and cash. That way I don’t have to lock my purse in the car during practice and worry about it being broken into. The belt lays flat and no one is the wiser. Bought two as gifts also for friends when we go to Disneyland. It’s definatly 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rita V

customer_reviews.title: Well made and arrived on time as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking gears. I purchased a couple for upcoming trip and they're exactly what I was looking for. Price is right,good looking, well made. Best of all arrived on time as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and hidden and COMFORTABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this under my pants/ shirt while traveling through Europe and it was such a convenient thing to have! I felt safe keeping my money, id, passport, train ticket, etc. in there without anyone getting to it. The strap is adjustable and it does not have to be super tight to stay in place. After about a day of wearing it, I got completely used to it. I had friends wearing a similar one but around their neck which irritated their skin and was more of a risk to get pick pocketed. Everyone wished they had gotten the same one I did because of how unnoticeable it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for slim people
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take and use on a trip to France. After I put it on, I realized it wouldn’t work as I had hoped. I am 5’5” and weigh 125. When worn under clothes it creates a bulge that can easily be seen. I ended up just stuffing it in a cheap backpack and used it as a wallet. Great for storage of your important documents and money, but not for wearing.
customer_reviews.author: nichibry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Efficient and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this new money belt! I wear it low--along my back beneath the belt of my pants--and it fits very comfortably. Particularly important is its sturdy elastic belt with a good snap which enables me to avoid the problem of an ever-more-twisted elastic band that I've experienced with all of my previous money belts. I also like the fact that I won't have to keep slipping my passport and credit cards in and out of RFID envelops because the pouch does that for me. Not least, I like the light beige color which doesn't show beneath light clothing. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not so much water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. That's what I've been looking for... Waterproof, comfy, well made Update: unfortunately is not that water resistant like I was hoping. If you're having your shorts wet ( after swimming) everything gets wet inside your belt in under 10minutes of wearing it Otherwise is great
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Slim, light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Slim, light and comfortable. Has plenty of storage and protects my credit cards and passport with RFID. Can be worn inside or outside of clothing. Quality overall seems very good. For safety, I inserted the waist strap thru two rear belt loops of my pants and was still able to wear the money belt under my pants in front.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Good little travel necessity
customer_reviews.text: Just took this to Rome Italy, a must have! Very lightweight, the only issue is that it’s hard sometimes to get open simply because it sits so nice and flat against your body. Very roomy though! Held all my euros, passport, small wallet and iPhone X!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B Provensen

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It feels very well made, excellent quality. I love all the different sections/pockets...they will come in handy for storing things I'll need on my upcoming trip. The seller is excellent and very professional. When my bag arrived, it had a slight defect and they had a replacement one in the mail to me so fast, it was actually delivered to my home before I could even return the first bag. Very impressive and awesome customer service! Good communication, too...kept me up to date on when I could expect the replacement via email.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader 4455

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travelers or commuters
customer_reviews.text: My husband will be traveling and this is perfect! He is a "big" guy (38/40 waist) and it fit him very well. He loves it and I'm sure will continue to use it even when hes not traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep your money safe
customer_reviews.text: I recently went on a long trip and was out and about every day. I had money, a passport, credit cards, hotel key and transport docs that I kept in the pack each day. I kept it under my clothing so that it could not be seen. It kept everything safe and was light and comfortable to wear. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will wear comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I showed my husband a similar belt recommended by the travel guy on the PBS travel shows and he wanted to try for our trip to Europe. He likes the look and size of it, we will give full review after using it. Update- My husband was very pleased with the belt. He was able to to tuck it in and wear under his sweaters and jackets without adding bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Rjean

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: I liked the "breathability" of this product. It seems durable although I have only worn it 2.5 weeks. It held quite a lot of things although it tended to "flip up" a bit, however, that was probably a body shape issue. I like it and felt my contents were secure and I think you will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have tried fanny packs during my trips abroad, but they are bulky and rather indiscreet under a shirt. This momey belt fits perfectly. The belt is stretchy and uber comfortable and the main storage area is ample to fit passport, cards, keys, phone and essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Boseman

customer_reviews.title: lim Minimalist Design Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: Used this money belt on a trip, got them for all 4 family members. It worked and was secure. It felt bulky though and definitely wasn't hidden unless you wear something big and loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as we were going to another country and did not want to carry around a wallet. It was very comfortable and easily accessible. Love that it has the RFID protection as well! I will continue to use this when we travel!
customer_reviews.author: Dennymack

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and safety of information
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I used it for an overseas trip. It held my passport, iPhone 6, credit card, money, chap stick and thin pack of hand wipes with no problem and fit under my clothes with little bulkiness.. no one even noticed.. it has an elastic adjustable strap that fits very comfortably. I got the beige
customer_reviews.author: Grannie of 7

customer_reviews.title: This is great for travel, holds everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is great,it fits my cell phone along with money, passport, airline tickets and a few cosmetics. Very comfortable to wear over your shirt or under your shirt. The waist is very adjustable, and you can even wear it over your neck and shoulder like a crossover. Great for travel or the amusement parks.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: Because of the high volume of crime in the country that I will be visiting on my upcoming trip, I will not be carrying a purse. My daughter has two of these belts and highly recommended it, so I also purchased two. One to hold money and passport and the other to hold my phone. Trip will not be until September, so truthfully, I have not used it yet, but look forward to the vacation. I pity the fool who tries to mess with me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best waist wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: Best waist wallet ever!! The quality Is great! Soft and durable. It is so thin that you would feel very comfortable and safe. I am recommending this wallet to family and friends!!
customer_reviews.author: yolanda figueroa

customer_reviews.title: It is slim but, hold quite a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily. Just remember to zip when you slip your credit card back into it's pocket. Although, I have left the zipper open, I have not lost anything. D.M.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel - bought 2 - one of each of us
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot and the this money belt is the perfect size. It has 2 zippers. I put the passports in one area with my credit cards and put the money in the other zippered area. They are comfortable and breathable. They lay flat so you can't tell you have them on. I have had other belts before that were too small and couldn't fit the passports. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fanny pack
customer_reviews.text: Great fanny pack. It has a stretch belt and should fit all sizes. Quality is good. 2 zippers, and 2 smaller inner pockets. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: DJ310

customer_reviews.title: Hardly new it was there!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for a recent European trip. They easily stored everything we needed to carry. Euros, ID and credit cards all had their own place to fit. A phone could fit as well if needed. So comfortable we forgot we had them on!
customer_reviews.author: RockyB

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to use & comfortable fit! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used on a recent shore excursion to Paris from our cruise and then during our five-day stay in London. He was reluctant, but was warned by our tour guide about pick pocket schemes in Paris and our driver to London gave the same warnings. Worked fine as it held his passport, credit cards and foreign currency and fit comfortably beneath his vest/jacket. He was able to get to money easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Traveling Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used money belts in the past and they were small and had poor zippers. This product has good size, good zippers and built in RFID. Nice overall product and the right size and decent size compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I travel throughout the world, as I work for an airline. I purchased this money belt when I planned a trip to France last summer, and it was very reassuring to wear it in comfort carrying extra cash. I don’t normally write reviews, but I was asked by the founder of this company to write a review. However I would not do her the courtesy of writing this review if I didn’t believe in the product. I would recommend this belt to anyone traveling abroad or even for other purposes. The price is write, and its well put together.
customer_reviews.author: William Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight money belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is light weight and holds everything I need to bring with me on my bike ride. One person stated the belt does not adjust. She was wrong and did not look close enough. It is has very good stretch and has an adjustment on it. I have a 44" waist and it fits great and I did not even open it all the way. Plenty room for a larger waist. 10" plus. I carry my epi pen, phone, Identification, money and there is a lot of room left.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Chudich

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! I will be able to fit my phone, cards, passport and cash in there and still have tons of room. The belt stretches to OMG HUGE. Which is good because I am a big gal. Size 26.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiDorkyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a trip and it worked great. Hide it under my pants 👖 and forgot that it was there. Very comfortable. ^_^ Will see how it holds up in future trips.
customer_reviews.author: ICe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...well worth money.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice...my lady is in the Bahamas right now and I bought her on of these so she didn't have to carry an open purse...they are comfortable easy to adjust ...I liked them so well I bought nor for my 380 concealed, you know what I mean....very nice , they have plenty of room if your jogging or walking,there is a comfortable netting on back side also storage......has RFID stop so,safe for your credit card...good quality....
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... Lightweight and I was glad to receive and confirm for myself that it can easily carry cash, credit card(s) and a couple of passports (with RFID protection for added security). Fits comfortably around and can be easily adjusted for larger or smaller fit. We bought this for our European adventure after hearing about the many pickpockets, especially on public transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: NIcely made and appears adequate
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and should work fine. If you don't have a waist then I can see how this might not have a place to stay-put, if you know what I mean. A good value I think. If I run into any issues after my vacation I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: M. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly light, almost invisible.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for Our Disney vacation. I was very pleased that I could have all what I need on me and not on my wife’s purse, very easily accessible and most importantly I did t even feel that it was on my waste. It’s very light and stays under my t-shirt almost invisible. I’m planning to wear it around every day.
customer_reviews.author: Emman M

customer_reviews.title: Love the minimalist design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an upcoming international trip, but realized I could also use this when I go jogging and my pockets don’t have much space for my wallet or phone. Great design, and build quality. No complaints here, I’m glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Like crinkely tissue paper for your waist
customer_reviews.text: Well, if you like the sound of crinkly tissue paper then this belt pack is for you, not me. Interior stitching looks like it will last one trip. sad
customer_reviews.author: Ray L. Mantych

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not as nice as another model that looks the same I had
customer_reviews.text: A must for international travel, you won't go wrong with this quality money belt. Missing a couple of nice features and little cubbies my other one had, but if your needing one, and you want reliable delivery before the trip, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for keeping money and passport safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Spain. The belt was comfortable and not too hot in the summer time. It had room for money (bills and coins) and metro cards and hotel keys....it held everything I needed without any extra bulk. I always felt like everything was safe while another in our part was pickpocketed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gottfried

customer_reviews.title: Good Travel Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, shipped as promised, received as described, pockets seem to have high utility, good sizes and fit. I would have liked a slightly heavier duty elastic belt/strap and a bit lower price, but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Williford

customer_reviews.title: Fun bag
customer_reviews.text: Interesting new concept of old type carry all. It’s light weight and under or over clothes. Even across body when adjusted correctly Quite unique and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I found the size and quality to be good. Depending on how much you carry it can be worn and remain hidden under a loose shirt/sweater. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JPag

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This money belt is great, unnoticeable. I use it to keep my passport, money and other IDs on a recent trip. I did not experience any discomfort wearing it in hot and humid weather. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my runs and traveling. Fits my waist perfectly. Great inside compartments and good for that extra security. Definitely worth the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Safiyaah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this money belt for my trip to Peru. I was nervous that I needed a money belt so that I can store my phone, passport, money, hotel keys, etc and not lose them. I love how this money belt because it is not bulky but yet has plenty of room to store all the things! It is durable and water resistant. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gucci de guzman

customer_reviews.title: One less thing to worry about when you travel
customer_reviews.text: Traveling abroad is always an adventure. I used this money belt on a recent trip to Italy and it helped to make my trip be a positive adventure as my cash, credit card and passport were secure. This product is well made and worked as advertised. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you can wear it under your shirt, otherwise the security is not all that high.
customer_reviews.text: One of the zippers doesn’t open. The passport pouch is perfect , but I cannot open the money pouch. This had be checked before sending it to me. I am ordering another one and hoping that’s not going to have any problems. I like the light weight, however, the belt seem to be very flimsy and could easily be cut. So, more suitable to wear under clothing and not so much over.
customer_reviews.author: YoureNotLostFAN

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable enough to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: Have never tested RFID blocking, but have used the belt on trips to Europe and S. America. It is comfortable enough to wear all day, even on busy travel days, lugging backpacks across cities and through airports and train stations.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: I can comment on the quality - which is excellent. I cannot comment on the items functionality because I have not used it yet. I will update after I have used it. Update: I used this in Mexico a few month ago and it works really well, you could not detect it under my clothes. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: THEHOODS

product_meta.title: Slim Minimalist Design Money Belt, RFID Blocking for Men & Women - Ideal for Keeping Your Cash, Credit Card, Passport, Phone Safe When Traveling
feature_bullets: ✅ WEAR ALL DAY LONG, WHATEVER THE WEATHER Fully adjustable elastic strap ensures a comfortable fit for men and women up to 56-inch waist. Soft , breathable , mesh material wicks away moisture to eliminate sweating so you stay cool and dry . Also prevents any discomfort or irritation to your skin so wallet can be worn on your body discreetly and comfortably under clothing

✅ LARGE CAPACITY FOR ALL YOUR TRAVEL ESSENTIALS Ample room to store your currency , credit cards , keys , passports , tickets and other important documents. Fits all phones like an iPhone and smartphone . Includes two separate zippered compartments with inner mesh pocket for easy organization . There's a place for everything

✅ KEEPS YOUR VALUABLES HIDDEN FROM PICKPOCKETS Keeps cash cards keys and travel documents close and concealed . The slim lightweight design ensures pouch is discreet and invisible to others when worn under clothes . Not bulky or cumbersome like a fanny pack . Provides easy access to your gear without being noticeable

✅ WILL LAST A LIFETIME OF TRIPS These belts are constructed from waterproof 210D ripstop nylon and designed to stand the test of time . Double stitched reinforced seams prevent rips and tears . Sturdy clasp clips securely in place . Reliable snag-free zippers with handy nylon tabs are a breeze to open and close

✅ PROTECT YOUR CASH AND IDENTITY FROM THEFT Stay one step ahead of opportunistic thieves and keep your belongings safe and secure at all times . Built in RFID blocking fabric prevents illegal scanning of your personal information to secure your ID from electronic pickpocketing . Travel just became a whole lot safer

✅ HASSLE FREE ASSURANCE : Experience the ultimate in RFID Money Belts or get your money back. Our travel money belt comes with peace of mind risk-free satisfaction guarantee. 24H INSTANT CONNECT - if you're not completely happy, we'll make sure your money is refunded - no questions asked, no fuss.
